title: Avatar
insight: James Cameron's visually stunning film Avatar became the highest-grossing film of all time upon its release in 2009.

title: Avengers: Endgame
insight: Avengers: Endgame is a 2019 superhero film that concludes the Infinity Saga, following the surviving members of the Avengers as they attempt to undo the damage caused by Thanos.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
insight: Avatar: The Way of Water is a visually stunning sequel that expands on the world of Pandora, exploring themes of family, identity, and environmentalism.

title: Titanic
insight: The film "Titanic" is a timeless epic romance disaster that tells the tragic story of the 1912 sinking of the RMS Titanic.

insight: Star Wars: The Force Awakens is a 2015 epic space opera film that revitalized the iconic franchise with a new generation of characters.

title: Jurassic World

title: The Lion King
insight: The 2019 version of The Lion King is a photorealistic computer-animated remake of the 1994 animated classic, directed by Jon Favreau.

insight: Top Gun: Maverick is a high-flying action sequel that sees Tom Cruise reprising his iconic role as Maverick.

insight: Avengers: Age of Ultron is a superhero film that explores the Avengers team's battle against an artificial intelligence threat.

insight: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial is a timeless classic about a young boy who befriends an alien stranded on Earth.
